properties.entry: INSERT into log_relation_change(`id`,`serviceName`,`accessToken`,`clientIP`, `appId`,`createDate`,`userId`,`userName`,`houseId`,`houseName`,`projectId`,`projectName`,`gridId`,`gridName`,`organizationId`,`organizationName` ,`customerId`,`customerName`,`resourceId`,`resourceName`,`changeType`,`relationId`,`relationText`) VALUES(#id#,#serviceName#,#accessToken#,#clientIP#, #appId#,#createDate#,#userId#,#userName#,#houseId#,(select name from vankecrm_center.main_house where id =#houseId#),#projectId#,#projectName#,#gridId#,#gridName#,#organizationId#,#organizationName# ,#customerId#,#customerName#,#resourceId#,#resourceName#,#changeType#,#relationId#,#relationText#)

insert into log_data_modify (`id`,`serviceName`,`accessToken`,`clientIP`,`appId`,`changeEntityClass`,`tableName`,`userId`, `userName`,`createDate`,`customerId`,`customerName`,`houseId`,`houseName`,`projectId`,`projectName`,`gridId`,`gridName`,`organizationId`,`organizationName`) VALUES(#id#,#serviceName#,#accessToken#,#clientIP#,#appId#,#changeEntityClass#,#tableName#,#userId#, #userName#,#createDate#,#customerId#,#customerName#,#buildingId#,(select name from vankecrm_center.main_house where id =#buildingId#), #projectId#,#projectName#,#gridId#,#gridName#,#organizationId#,#organizationName#)
